title: How many alive spiritual gurus are there in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: None.. Since Guru is Achyutam (which is never got created by chyutam (yoni)) Only chyutias (born out of yoni creatures) r promoted as Gurus..whereas they r mere ghuntals.. not Gurus.. It is so since creation is of chyutias. Chyutias created by chyutam (mother power of illusion) luv to follow chyutias or make other chyutias to follow them..since both have no clue of achyutam (which is never created by chyutam)..
